title: Ticket #266: Old shadow: better failure detection when sending commands to StartD
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

Dan's approach is to query the Collector and make sure the StartD's ad is there after sending the command. I'm not sure what failure mode this is protecting against. Commands are already sent to the StartD with TCP. Perhaps since the communication is one-way it's possible for a the Shadow to presume success when the StartD is hung but never actually reads the command?

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (16).
